modName: ALL PERKS- CRAFTING ITEMS and more - now with DG Crafting ITEMS
summary: These are simple batch files or bat files; to give you in game items you will need as you play and give you all the perks in specific skill classes. (Dawngaurd spells included in the perk areas)
descriptionHtml:
Since i am one of the many who want to contribute to modding, instead of just taking and cannot figure out how to mod myself, this is my contribution to the game. If you like it then please endorse it!!!

Are you tired of the reduntant tasks such a smithing, enchanting, and alchemy that seem to take FOREVER to level up? Are you tired of spending longs hours grinding for crafting materials? Do you never seem to have enough gold, lock picks, or carry weight? Maybe there are other skills you want but are to impatient to grind them up, or you can\'t find the nessesary items to grind them up.

Look no further I have provided an answer for you.
 
These are simple batch files or bat files; to give you in game items you will need as you play and give you all the perks in specific skill classes. (Dawngaurd spells included in the perk areas)

**Included**

**Perks**

1 Handed Weapons
2 Handed Weapons
Alchemy
Alteration - With Tomes and Spells
Archery
Block
Conjuration - With Tomes and Spells
Destruction - With Tomes and Spells
Enchanting
Heavy Armor
Illusion - With Tomes and Spells
Light Armor
Lock Picking
Pickpocket
Restoration - With Tomes and Spells
Sneak
Smithing 
Speechcraft
Werewolf
Vampire Lord

**Items**

Enchanting through Disenchanting
(adds items to disenchant for the spells and 9999 of each filled soul gem) 
Crafting Mats (adds Ingots, Leather, Straps, & Ingredients) - adds 9999 of each item(NOW WITH DG CRAFTING ITEMS!!!)
Leather and Hides adds 9999 of each hide and leather in the game / DG
Needed items - (adds a LOT of gold 9999 lock picks and gives 100000 carry weight.)
Spell Tomes (adds all spell tomes from vanilla game)
Skill Books (adds all skill books from vanilla game)
Dragon shouts (unlocked even if you have not started the main quest line yet)

**To Use The Files**

In game hit the ~  or ` key to open the console then for the different things:(do not include Quotation Marks)

1 Handed Weapons - type \"bat add-perk-1hwep\"

2 Handed Weapons - type \"bat add-perk-2hwep\"

Alchemy - type \"bat add-perk-alchemy\"

Alteration - type \"bat add-perk-alteration\"

Archery - type \"bat add-perk-archery\"

Block - type \"bat add-perk-block\"

Conjuration - type \"bat add-perk-conjuration\"

Destruction - type \"bat add-perk-destruction\"

Enchanting - type \"bat add-perk-enchant\"

Heavy Armor - type \"bat add-perk- heavyarmor\"

Illusion - type \"bat add-perk-illusion\"

Light Armor - type \"bat add-perk-lightarmor\"

Lock Picking - type \"bat add-perk-lockpick\"

Pickpocket - type \"bat add-perk-pickpocket\"

Restoration - type \"bat add-perk-restoration\"
Sneak - type \"bat add-perk-sneak\"

Smithing - type \"bat add-perk-smithing\"

Speechcraft - type \"bat add-perk-speechcraft\"

Enchanting through Disenchanting - type \"bat add-chant-items\"

Crafting Mats - type \"bat add-crafting-mats\"

Spell Tomes - type \"bat add-spell-tomes\"

Skill Books - type \"bat add-skill-books\"

Needed Items - type \"bat add-gold-picks\"

Dragon Shouts - type \"bat add-dragon-shout\"

Leather and hides - type \"bat add-leather-hide

Unique Item - type \"tmg\" hit enter (so you dont get over burdened) then type \"bat add-unique-item\"

Gemstones - type \"bat add-all-jewls\"

Werewolf - type \"bat add-perk-ww\" You must be in Werewolf Form for this one to work

Vampire Lord - type \"bat add-perk-vl\" You must be in Vampire Lord form for this one to work
**Installation**
Unpack files to your
C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\Skyrim
foler should be placed in the same folder with the TESV.exe file NOT IN THE DATA FOLDER

**Uninstallation**
Simple either: 
1) dont use the commands to add the things or 
2) delete the files that begin with the word add


Find me on Steam search for Wolfpyre 
Location: Amarillo, Tx. USA

Troubleshooting:
[Dawnguard must be at the top of the data files list in your skyrim launcher. Open skyrim > data files > click dawnguard > keep clicking the up arrow until it gets to the top > enjoy! :]

When you exit Vampire Lord Form you will find 3x Rings in your inventory, get rid of all 3 or you will have to re apply the .txt file every time you enter Vampire lord form. (they all look similar, one is called Ring of Vampiric Grip, another Ring of the Gargoyle and the other one is Ring of Reanimate Corpse, you can sell them or throw them into a river or whatever xD)

Thanks To:

Akimb0 - for the file and the idea for this mod 
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/318 

and to:

Theshawty - for the files
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3749
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3750

In addition to:

Zohar127 - for the file
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5610

Further More Thanks to:
SONNYSPAK  - For his Were Wolf Perks and Vampire Lord Perks bat files
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21627
and
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21623
